sn44.3:3.1: 3. Paṭhamasāriputtakoṭṭhikasutta
sn44.3:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto, āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn44.3:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
sn44.3:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn44.3:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
sn44.3:5.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.3:5.4: “Kiṃ panāvuso, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.3:5.7: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.3:5.9: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.3:5.10: “Kiṃ panāvuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.3:5.12: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.3:6.1: “‘Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti iti puṭṭho samāno, ‘abyākataṃ kho etaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā—
sn44.3:6.2: hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi … pe …
sn44.3:6.3: ‘kiṃ panāvuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44.3:6.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44.3:6.6: Ko nu kho, āvuso, hetu, ko paccayo yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn44.3:7.1: “Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, rūpagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.2: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, rūpagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.3: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, rūpagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.4: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, rūpagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.5: Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, vedanāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.6: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, vedanāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.7: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, vedanāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.8: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, vedanāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.9: Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, saññāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.10: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saññāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.11: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saññāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.12: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saññāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.13: Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, saṅkhāragatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.14: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saṅkhāragatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.15: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saṅkhāragatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.16: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saṅkhāragatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.17: Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, viññāṇagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.18: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, viññāṇagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.19: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, viññāṇagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.20: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, viññāṇagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:7.21: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, hetu ayaṃ paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti.
